website_summaries.verdict: Tons of high-end features combined to create the best PS4 headset around.
pros: Amplified sound for superior surround sound, crisp and powerful 50-millimeter drivers, ultra-comfortable modern design
Black design mimics that of the PS4 and Dualshock 4

customer_reviews.title: Wired headset has to be charged?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had numerous Turtle Beach headphones over the years but this one is the worst. This WIRED headset requires to be CHARGED, makes no sense. The adapter for it to be also used on PC is NOT included. (Description states it is WIN10 compatible). The mic is so short and sound quality isn’t great. I will be looking for an alternative, I love Turtle Beach but they dropped the ball on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a cheap pair of SHADES that I used when Players Unknown Battlegrounds (PUBG) came out and pre ordered my first ever set of turtle beaches. These Recon 200s are bangin. The sound is crystal clear on chat when in a party and game play. I can hear footsteps from buildings across the road. I also play rocket league with pandora in the background and I can hear the game around 30% and my music the other 70% and the music sounds amazing. Along with chat in the background as well. Anyway. These are a sweet pickup if your looking for an amazing set of headphones at a very good price (IMO)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Weeter

customer_reviews.title: Great game chat for proce
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are great for the quality. I play a lot of Fortnite with my friends and they come through crystal clear when they are arguing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great headset, absolutely worth the price. The only downside is that you have to charge them since they have bass boost and other features but unless you’re constantly having 12 hour gaming sessions this shouldn’t be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: I strongly suggest against purchasing this device. I am an actual paying customer.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing good to say about the product. It is surely NOT what I expected to find when purchasing a turtle beach. This product is absolutely terrible, and a pain to use. The headset is not comfortable in any way, the padding is rock hard and has minimal give. The audio is just constant white noise with far too much mic feedback. I would be more satisfied with the $8 mic you can find in the PS4 box. Do not buy this mic. It is NOT worth anything above $10.
customer_reviews.author: Janel Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Everything is nice about them, expect the fact that after a few hours of game play they quit playing sounds. You can charge them all you want, doesnt do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S.

customer_reviews.title: Loves them
customer_reviews.text: The hubby got these to use since he is playing the xbox on a monitor that doesn't have sound. I get the added benefit of not hearing his WoT game. There is just so many times you can hear "I spotted one" without going crazy! He reports that these are the best headphones he has ever had, better than his Sony noise canceling headset. Only complaint I have is that the hubby doesn't come with a volume control, he can't hear himself so when he talks to me it's always much louder than necessary.
customer_reviews.author: DStiefer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, comfortable, very nice design 10/10
customer_reviews.text: i love this headset! Its so comfortable, I'll wear it for hours and they dont ever hurt. The microphone works great and i like the adjustable sensitivity. The design is really nice and i can't complain about the materials. Everyone that uses my headset complimets it. The only thing i could complain about is that I wish they extended more. They're plenty big for my above average head, but i like having extra room.
customer_reviews.author: P.C.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loved It!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my 11 year old grandson to use with his XBox. Works very well, and he is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Becker

customer_reviews.title: flimsy cord shorted out
customer_reviews.text: Here lies the problem - the cord is so thin and cheap that it started shorting out the mic connection before they were even 2 months old! Of course the deadline to return closed only a few days before this happened so i’m out the $$$ EXTREMELY disappointing and i feel completely ripped off. Do not recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Melissa  Andrus

customer_reviews.title: Microphone doesn't work without Xbox One Turtle beach adapter
customer_reviews.text: This was a very disappointing mic. I bought this and spend over an hour on how to fix it, just to find out that you need an adapter for the microphone to work (adapter costs $40). I will say the audio is good, but the microphone system is ridiculous for Xbox One. I also want to note that this mic requires charging. This makes absolutely no sense if it is a wired mic. I do not recommend this mic and go spend your valuable money on a way more worth it mic than this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: I UNKNOWINGLY BOUGHT A DAMAGED PAIR AND THE OWNER WHO TRADED THIS PAIR IN DEFITNITELY KNEW IT!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned many headsets over the past 30+ years of gaming, but I've never bought a pair of pre-owned from fear of exactly what happened to me with THIS purchase. My headset came WITHOUT the male plug that goes into your controller. It's actually been broken OFF, so whoever had this pair before me? KNEW IT. Now I've come to the most important part: If this was ACTUALLY INSPECTED BY AMAZON??? IT WOULDN'T BE MISSING ANY PARTS! THIS HEADSET IS COMPLETELY DESTROYED! BEWARE WHEN BUYING USED!

customer_reviews.title: The perfect low budget headset
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset! I have owned many gaming headsets over time and this is much better than more expensive turtle beach headsets I have used. It is also more comfortable than anything else I’ve used in the past. UPDATE: after a few months of use, the battery life is still great and everything works perfectly. I would recommend this headset to anyone looking for a budget headset that performs well. I honestly rate it higher than all of my previous headets that cost as much as 5x this amount.
customer_reviews.author: Ford

customer_reviews.title: 100% Family Approved
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing. My husband got them for his gaming (yes he’s 32 and plays XBox still). However we started letting our 4 year old wear them while he was watching a movie so we could clang around in the kitchen. I use the headphones when I’m watching a show and just mute the TV late at night. Soooo soundproof. My husband and I have startled each other countless times because we can’t hear anything else besides what we are watching.
customer_reviews.author: Ahna Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound, Headband Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I do like these headphones for their sound and adjustment options. I also like how lightweight they are. However, they are not the most comfortable sadly. The earpieces themselves are fairly small, so they don’t hug your entire ear comfortably, and the headband needs more cushioning. I find myself moving it back and forth on my head a lot cause it starts hurting a little after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Nataly

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my husband. Though the first ones we bought came in broken, we ended up buying another pair because he liked them so much. He loves the fact that the speaker can lift up if he doesn't want anyone to hear the background noise or if he needs to talk to me while gaming. His last ones had a button that he always had to fumble for so he loves the ease of access to turn the speaker on and off. He also liked all the volume and speaker capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Ok headset.
customer_reviews.text: My past experiences with Turtle Beach have been very poor, to put it mildly. I've owned higher end premium headsets from them back in the Xbox 360 days and they always broke in less than a year from cheap headband construction. Anyway, I'm here giving them another shot. These seem like they're better built but only time will tell. So far they have good sound (not great but good enough for the price I paid). I'll also say these headphones do hurt my ears a lot after just a couple of hours, I'm hoping that my ears adjust after a breaking in period but I won't get my hopes up.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy the sound quality. It’s like being in your own home theater without waking up your kids and the old lady too. I’d recommend these. Almost wish I’d splurged and went with the wireless. Of course there is a cord with a jack for your controller, but I overlooked the fact that you still have to charge them. They don’t run off of the controllers power like my old headset. Which probably explains the great sound. The charger is really short, but a PS4 controller charging cable is long enough to charge it while using it. Conveniently they have the same style charging ports. Comfortable to wear also.
customer_reviews.author: AllAmericanAllTheTime

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: These were awesome at first but after a month the or two the wires internally are loose and make a popping and hissing sound if moved.. They were out of Amazon's 30 day warranty and the manufacturer said it would take a minimum of 2 weeks to replace them, that's 2 weeks without the product. My son uses them everyday so he just deals with the defect for now
customer_reviews.author: Jen and Rick

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son in March of this year, it is now May and they have already stopped working. He uses them with his wireless Xbox one controller and we now have to “find the sweet spot” while plugging in the headset and turning the connector ever so slowly trying to hear through the headset. We may or may not be able to find this spot but it rarely continues to work. 9 times out of 10 we unplug the headset and he goes without. It’s unfortunate because he can’t communicate with his friends now except through text chat on Xbox. I wouldn’t recommend spending the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Turner

customer_reviews.title: Expected better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use with my Xbox One and I expected better. The sound quality is just okay. I can't notice the bass boost, which is why the unit requires a charge. The mic monitoring is not good. It picks up more sound from my controller clicking, and the roommate's talking than my own voice. The non built in Xbox mic monitoring worked great on an older recon head set I owned.. There's a switch to change between Xbox and PS and it sounds better when switching to PS. I bought this one after they sent me the wrong color Recon 70. I should have saved myself all the trouble and kept my Recon 50!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is garbage. Why does a wired head set need charged?
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk. I bought this headset for my son who uses it every other weekend. When turned off and not in use it can’t even hold a charge. When fully charged and used for a brief time battery life sucks. Very crappy “Xbox, power, ps4” toggle switch
customer_reviews.author: Michael Coletta

customer_reviews.title: Kinda strangely made, needs two wires
customer_reviews.text: It works well, but it has a micro USB charger unlike most wires headphones. And without that charge it won’t work. And it doesn’t even hold a charge for any amount of time, so you need two wires into your computer at all times. The mic is nice though, it activates when placed down, and deactivates when placed up.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Watch out! The 3.5mm tears easily.
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed. The product was working fine at the beginning. But then comes problems with the 3.5mm connection... Yeeez! Now I have to mute or play with the connection because of the flimsy 3.5mm connector. It's kinda cheap and you can't fix it. Once it's broken it's broken. I feel like I'm obligated to buy a new one. I guess not. The only reason I gave this a star was because the sound for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: BEST HEADPHONES
customer_reviews.text: My three young grandsons are gamers and have been wanting a better headphones. Mom and Dad are not in a position to spend this kind of money on certain things. So I figured it would be nice of grandma to fulfill their wishes especially on christmas day! They were thrilled with their gifts and claimed it's the best headphones they've ever had! Of course game time is limited! :)
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: The advertised bass boost isn't really real. Comparing to the bass to my sony gold headset, they sound about the same. I bought these as a back up headset for my ps4 and sound quality is ok but not as great as I hoped. I do like the metal reinforcement for the headband. It gives extra sturdiness. But overall, the whole structure of the headset feels flimsy. But I guess you get what you paid for. A low mid grade headset.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey V. Vu

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: First headset worked for 2 hours then no sound at all. Returned it and ordered the exact same headset again. Worked for less than 24 hours then no sound again. DO NOT buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny A

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: First, these are VERY uncomfortable and hot, if you plan on wearing these for more than a half an hour at a time then be ready to be constantly adjusting due to the heat and pain from how tight these sit. Sound is decent but it doesn’t block out any outside noise at all which is incredible for how tight they fit. Definitely pass on these
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Pomeroy

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my children (have had them for close to 2 weeks), so they could talk with other players. I even tried it, by connecting it to my phone; and it works flawlessly. The bass is really good, and the fit (personal preference) it great, they are comfortable and provide an almost soundproof (noise cancelling) effect. I am satisfied with these headphones, build quality feels solid, sound quality is good, and price is really good. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: PWA2600

customer_reviews.title: not worth it- headphone gave out within three months
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted these so bad for playing games. He saved all his birthday money to buy them. Then within a few months one earphone went out. Not worth doing.
customer_reviews.author: SummerSto

customer_reviews.title: A solid reliable product
customer_reviews.text: Most expensive headphones ive ever purchased. Of course there are more expensive ones out there but I wanted something better than the basic standard. I used one of the predecessors of this product which is what first made me impressed by Turtle Beach. I like being able to use it for my phone too (if your phone still has a headphone jack). Very solid choice for the "slightly more than casual gamer", like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you realize they’re chargeable before purchasing!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. Bought this headset with decently high expectations as I’ve previously bought Turtle Beaches before. First off, you have to charge them. Why you have to charge a wired headset is completely beyond me. The charge itself last 2-3 hours. They’re constantly dying mid match and since I play a lot of Xbox live with my friends it’s cost us the match several times. I wouldn’t recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This headphones are pretty decent for the price. The sound quality is decent, but they don’t get too loud. They do seem to have decent noise canceling capabilities, but it’s not great. They fit comfortably but I’ve had other turtle beach headphones that felt nicer. My only complaints are that it doesn’t seem to get very loud and the battery life does not last very long. Maybe I just don’t charge them as often as I should. All in all, a decent pair of headphones for the price and I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine until it didn't
customer_reviews.text: My son did his research and decided on this headset. It looks nice and has worked just fine until today when the microphone stopped working. It may be the connection piece (part that goes into the xbox controller) is defective b/c there is no visible damage to it. Disappointing and happy to replace it with a new one but Amazon didn't give us that option - had to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones But Annoying
customer_reviews.text: My high school-aged son really likes these headphones but he says they are annoying. They are annoying for two reasons: 1) You have to charge them and 2) They do not automatically turn off when you unplug them. So, if these two items do not bother you, then these are the headphones for you.
customer_reviews.author: V. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: It breaks fast
customer_reviews.text: At first it was working fine,im taking care of it, havent dropped it. But two weeks later it breaks once u turn it on it annoyes the people you are playing with. Mathes you sound like a robot. Wouldnt recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Damere white

customer_reviews.title: Superb Gamer Headset. 🎮👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best gaming headsets I’ve bought thus far. I own a PS4, and the sound quality with having the lows mids and highs are great. The in-line chat is clear, you can hear yourself as well so you don’t feel like your taking too loud while in chat. But above all, a great product. I would recommend this to any casual or avid gamer.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Santana

customer_reviews.title: No Sound on Xbox One!  No response from support!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's xbox one. He has the newer controllers with the jack. Thought I would upgrade his headset since the cheaper one broke. Followed the instructions for xbox set up and no sound. Contacted Support - NO RESPONSE. Frustrating!! Should have just ordered another cheaper one.
customer_reviews.author: WMT

customer_reviews.title: Good headset. Could be better with a better switch.
customer_reviews.text: Good headset. The sound and mic are a big upgrade from my last set. Only bad thing I can find is the detent on the switch is not very good. I find that even when I thought I turned it off it is still on and drains the battery. This is an annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: DBO

customer_reviews.title: The breakdown.
customer_reviews.text: Comfort during many hours of play - 5/5 Battery life - 5/5 Usability - 5/5 Sound quality - 4/5 Mic quality - 4/5 Worth the price - Yes Pros - Cost, Battery life, Cross platform usability, easy to mute Cons- Has to be charged to be used
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one week!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product looked great and feels strong but is not made very well. After only one weeks worth of use it has already broken. The piece that hooks into the controller snapped off and now I can't use the headset or the controller. I tried to find replacement piece for headset but it is not offered since the other end cannot be removed from the headset. Not satisfied with such a short life span for a reasonably priced gaming headset :(
customer_reviews.author: Lynchie13

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound, questionable (BAD) quality
customer_reviews.text: Decent headphones for the price but there must be a small piece of plastic or some type of bearing that is loose inside the right speaker and it rattles every time I move my head even slightly EDIT: When it works, it works well. I am now experiencing temporary loss of sound and have to jiggle the volume dial to get it back. If I bump the dial at all, it cuts out entirely. Will be looking into the return/replacement options. EDIT #2: no longer holds a charge. Completely unusable unless plugged in to a power source. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous2

customer_reviews.title: Not really Switch Compatible.
customer_reviews.text: You mark this as compatible as Switch. IT ONLY WORKS WHEN NOT DOCKED! What a ridiculous design flaw. I used once and will be returning. They should make it explicitly clear that it is mobile mode only. Pretty deceptive.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 3 days
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I made this bad of mistake. I purchased a product with horrible reviews and no return, why did I buy this headset? I have no idea, it stop working after about 3 days, around 8 hours. It did not hold a charge and the mic was iffy. Perhaps the biggest waist of money this year. So many options out there, don't buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Somebody

customer_reviews.title: Perfect headset for anyone
customer_reviews.text: This head set it’s perfect, it’s comfy on the ears. It’s pretty clear and I haven’t had any problems with it. You do have to charge it to be able to use it though but that’s not really a problem since it charges fast and it last a long time charged. Fits kids and adults
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: They’re just okay, love the white.
customer_reviews.text: They’re okay. They do make a lot of noise if you adjust them while they’re on your head, and the person in a game party can hear it. I have trouble with the audio every single time I plug them in. I have to always jiggle it to get it to give me sound. It never ever works the first time plugging them in. The flip up mute mic is awesome tho. I’m using them with an Xbox One X & PS4 Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrica

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU ARE HUNTING FOR GOOD XBOX HEADPHONES GET THESE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three pairs of headsets before these and I feel so stupid for not finding these they are awesome they are comfortable I can wear them for hours and the volume boost on them is great. they are pretty noise cancelling and work well with directionals sound. Trust me these are the best value for your money!
customer_reviews.author: David Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Superior sound quality for multisystem gamers
customer_reviews.text: Superior sound quality for gamers with multiple systems. The mic monitoring is perfect for those who play team based games. After purchasing wireless turtle beaches and returning them due to the drop out issues, these surpass them without sacrificing quality. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: oz

customer_reviews.title: Theyre okay
customer_reviews.text: Bought these thinking I’d be able to adjust game vs chat volume. Thought wrong, I am only able to adjust master volume vs mic sensitivity? Which I think is a pretty useless feature. Other than that, fits well, cancels noice out very well. Sound quality is okay (not the best though).
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sample

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my grandson for Christmas and he loves them. Like all 13 yr olds he plays video games all the time and if he likes them I'm betting you will too. Good price and received within a few days even during the Christmas rush. Win win.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne7

customer_reviews.title: Great for price!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a $200 gaming headset for Christmas. I got him these instead and they do not disappoint. Great sound-hearing and speaking-including crispness and clarity. My son loves them and uses them every day on his Xbox.
customer_reviews.author: Loki420

customer_reviews.title: Not any better than normal headphones, but you still have to charge them.
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because there is no amount of “amplified” sound or boost of bass. However, the sound quality is good, and I’d be perfectly happy with these headphones if I didn’t have to charge them. I’m not getting anything extra from these than I would from my other Sony (not gaming) headphones, and those don’t have to be charged. Good sound, but not worth the price of having to charge them every other day. If the bass was actually boosted, and if “surround sound” worked for PS4 instead of just Xbox, I’d have been happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but not the worst
customer_reviews.text: First of I wanna start by saying no these aren't the worst and there not the best. The mic audio is really really good but for some God known reason I have to charge this mic for 12 hours of play time. Why why do I have to do this its 2019 get with the times turtle beach. I heard from my friends in the party I made that the mic quality sounds really bad and tends to drop alot.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: This Pair Better than the Last
customer_reviews.text: We had to replace two sets of Turtle Beach headphones because they were faulty and stopped working within a month of purchase. These seem to be lasting longer than a month. So far, so good. My son likes that these are comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: M Penelope L

customer_reviews.title: Keep loosing sound.
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these and both had the same problem, they loose sound on the right speaker. To fix it you have to play with the sound until fix. If it wasnt for that problem this is a must if you're looking for a cheap headset.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Love the mic arm on/mute feature. Charging made easier with charger block alternative
customer_reviews.text: Comfy ear cups. Good at blocking room noise while im wearing with really good sound quality. Love the flip up and down on/mute mic arm so there's a clear indicator of mode. Length of cord is good for online gaming witn console controller. Doesn't pick up tinny noises like button clicks. Charging can be a pain with only one of ky PS4 usbs ipen because of an external drive but i use an iphone charger block and just use an outlet. Confirmed fine to do by turtle beach customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I exchanged a cheap pair of no names for these and I am happy i did. Yes they are WIRED and Yes must be charged but its worth the price. I can hear a mouse fart in COD now and its crazy! Comfortable, superb sound and absolutely no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: E-Money

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great value.
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset, I just wish I didn’t have to charge them. I’ve owned other headphones in the past that get their power from the remote. Small qualm I know, but still 5 stars. No issues at all out of them and I’ve had them for months.
customer_reviews.author: doworksonn420

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: For a headset it isn’t bad, I upgraded from the 50x, it is definitely an upgrade but also has its drawbacks, I have a big head and this headset hurts my ears even after being “stretched out” (put on a headrest maximum flex and extension) for two weeks, I always forget to turn it off when done and the next time I use it I have to plug it in
customer_reviews.author: John E. Corley

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in November it is April the mic quit working I've been trying to get ahold of Turtle Beach their voice box is full and I am getting nowhere I bought a warranty for it the warranty is in void because the manufacturer's warranty is still in place although you can't get a hold of the manufacturer very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Boecker

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, awesome sound, affordable price headphones!!!
customer_reviews.text: At first I bought a pair of headphones on Amazon from a company cause it was $19.99. I thought they would last pretty well and long. But soon, the cord started to rip and was falling apart. I took to amazon to find a pair of turtle beach because my buddy raved about them. He was not wrong when I got them. Yeah, I could of splurged for the more expensive but I do not care about charging them every once in awhile. These are great and well put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound terrific but you do need to charge them
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have terrific sound but they do need to be charged. Also are a little firm if you are going to be wearing them for more than an hour or two. maybe A little bit uncomfortable For prolonged periods of gaming
customer_reviews.author: L. Leader

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: The grandchildren and husband say they work great and I love them for the peace and quite while they enjoy playing their games. lol
customer_reviews.author: buttons

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE! Buy if you don’t have Gaming Headphones
customer_reviews.text: LOVE: The sound is great, price is great. Cord is long. I play on PS4 and it’s improved my gameplay. DISLIKE: At first, you’ll forget to turn it off. The off position is between PS4 and XBOX. I keep thinking it’ll automatically turn off. Then I come back to play and it’s dead. Since the internal battery doesn’t last super long, definitely remember to put your PS4 in rest mode and charge these after each use and to turn them off.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: These do need to be charged
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price. I love the look and color. They fit snug on your head with comfortable ear phones. They switch on and off and between PS4 and XBox (not sure if it makes a difference). They are great. They need to be charged with a standard usb cable like Androids or controller chargers typically use.
customer_reviews.author: TamBerine:

customer_reviews.title: Basically a paperweight. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: I just hooked it up to my xbox controller (I have the headset adapter.) and the bloody thing doesn't work. I tried everything I could think of and it does not work. A complete waste of money. Thanks for sending me garbage instead of a functioning headset Turtlebeach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk, died on day 2
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable fit, not made for adult men with average head size. Sound was passable but they cut in and out on the first use, then died completely on day 2. Very disappointed in the quality for $60. Don't waste your money, buy a decent brand.
customer_reviews.author: mathias ringle

customer_reviews.title: Bought used, ended up malfunctioning.
customer_reviews.text: The headset would violently screech in one ear once the batteries ran low, Amazon tech support was superb in helping my situation. Other than that they work well, not glasses friendly and are a little on the smaller side.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective
customer_reviews.text: Good buy if you aren’t a serious console gamer. I purchased a headset for my PC that says it works with Xbox. However, upon use there was terrible feedback. This headset took the feedback away and has been great. Just wish you could blue tooth it to the Xbox instead of a wire.
customer_reviews.author: Snosakowski

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Husband uses them constantly and loves the noise canceling aspect of them. He wears them every time he is playing
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones...nice durable sides, my old turtle beach broke which we all plastic sides but the metal should keep that from happening again. Good clear sound. Sometimes it’s a lil annoying to change settings with headphones on due to the switches being behind your left ear...I’m right handed so it would’ve been more confortable for me if the controls were on the right side.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Webb

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING headset
customer_reviews.text: the headset has wonderful sound quality, great versatility, and no issues at all. it has professional sound quality, (it does look a bit odd on your head, but who cares), and the mic is amazing. definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Stankiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. They are crap quality. I have gone through three pairs that don't last at all. Constant connection problems which makes no sense because they're WIRED headphones, yet still constant gargling through the speakers and dropped connections to your game. Not ever going the turtlebeach route again
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and get something else
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good. Headset is really creaky, lots of plastic sounds when moving the headset around which gets really annoying due to an extremely cheap feeling headset. If you have a bigger head you may get pressure headaches, to the point where 45 mins of wear time is very uncomfortable. Mic is ok, picks up absolutely everything so just be aware of that. Honestly, I would pass on these and check out the steelseries arctic line.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: For the price of these puppies you can’t go wrong. You could spend 200$ dollars but why? These are perfect and will provide all the sound you need for gaming. I also use them for listening on my computer. The noise canceling is excellent. I can’t hear crap when these are on (outside of the game) . I would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son for Christmas and the charging port has broken and one of the speakers cuts in and out as if it has a loose connection. These are no where near the quality that the hype has made them out to be. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: karen and Ben

customer_reviews.title: Best turtle beach set yet!
customer_reviews.text: Best turtle beaches I've had do far! While playing cod modern warfare, I can hear very clearly which direction around me and across the map people are walking, shooting, etc. Its so helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Chris barnes

customer_reviews.title: Works REALLY well but they require to be changed
customer_reviews.text: I like them! It is weird that they need to be charged though! While reading other reviews.... one said they had to buy a $40 adapter?!?! I have a PC, Switch, XBOX and PS4 but never needed anything extra! I’m a streamer and the voice is just fine! Came out clear as day! It take an Android charger cable and didn’t come with one though! They are loud and very well on footstep sounds and there’s a volume adjuster to hear your voice and others in the same room to! Or you can turn it down to just hear the game!
customer_reviews.author: Geo Smith

customer_reviews.title: It is a wired headset that needs a charger
customer_reviews.text: I like that it sounds good however it is a wired headset that needs to Ben charged. It is so annoying having to remember. Any other headset would probably be better if it is wired because then they won’t need to be charged
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: poor product
customer_reviews.text: the battery life is only a few hours and its wired. when not charged the headset makes a terrible sound when you are in a party. everybody i play with complains and tells me to unplug it. then i have to charge it for hours and it is very annoying to have my bad built in tv speakers playing while my brother is yelling at me to turn it down. i have to stop playing and go to the tv and turn it down. do not buy this headset
customer_reviews.author: Heather Thram

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: My fiance enjoys these. Used them a whole lot at first, not so much anymore. But he really liked the mic because when you flip it up it shuts off and to talk you can bring it to your mouth again. The noise cancellation is real. I notice on days hes annoyed a little more he wears them.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: There lasting
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son. Most headsets he goes through quick, so far these are lasting. He says the sound quality is better than previous models chat is good also.
customer_reviews.author: drewtx1

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for 30$... Probably better than you deserve.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to lose your hearing like me, these aren't quite loud enough. For the price, I'm very happy. I get headaches from the tension and weight of most headsets. I just did 4 hours on Ace combat and 6 hours of rolling face to DJ Tiesto and I'm pretty sure there's a few hours left on the battery. Bass is nice. It's not a 200$ 7.1 headset but yeah, I'm happy for 30$
customer_reviews.author: Cave

customer_reviews.title: Stoped working after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: I've had these head for 9 months and for 8 months the worked perfectly fine then the sound started to only work on the left side, I would here static every 5 minuets, and it started echoing a lot I had to unplug it the plug it back in every 10 minuets to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: I've had them for a few months now and I really enjoy them. Even after long periods of use they're not uncomfortable or annoying. The sound quality is great and I love that you can adjust the volume or microphone levels on the side. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a good quality, affordable gaming headset.
customer_reviews.author: Juan R.

customer_reviews.title: Good headset.
customer_reviews.text: The headset itself is a great quality item, the sound is great. Only thing I didn't like was that you have to charge them to use them. 4hrs of charge time isn't bad especially with an output of about 10-12hrs of game time after fully charged. One main thing though they do get uncomfortable after a few hours of wearing them. One thing for sure if you get these you need to break them in, just like any other new headset.
customer_reviews.author: Isaias Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: sturdy headset
customer_reviews.text: Loved the headset, except after having it for a little more than a year, the wire started to give out and microphone stopped working. Great quality while it lasted though, but be careful because it could be too small on your ears. It fits great on mine, but is very small for my friend. Other than that definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L. Mays

customer_reviews.title: amplification is good for ps4 PUBG
customer_reviews.text: Great amplified sound, tried another non amplified cheap 40 dollar alternative and returned in exchange for this model which works perfectly for games like PUBG where being able to hear foot steps of enemies and incoming gun fire is crucial. I am using it for my ps4 and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: aldo vargas

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Mic broke after less than two months of use and was not mishandled. Very unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctions with poor audio.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are garbage! Why? #1 The adjustable volume malfunctions causing only one earphone to work. Meaning I have to constantly adjust to get both to work. #2 They have to be charged all the time and don't have wire or battery alternatives. #3 I take the headphones off my head to go eat and they one side snaps! These headphones are made of some pretty weak plastic. Causes echo for other people who speak to me. Nice things to say about the headphones.... 😑
customer_reviews.author: Steven Warfield

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: You still have to charge it even thought it's wired. The buttons came in backwards. Also hurts the top of my head within a half hour of wearing it. Charge doesn't even last 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Smith

customer_reviews.title: 3 Cons
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointing. 3 reasons why: 1- the top head band is heavy, after a while that spot on your head hurts. 2- the mic monitoring doesn't go that high, so you still hear your voice muffled. 3- No battery level marker. These will turn off with no warning in the middle of a game. I was about to return them but meh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nephew was very happy with them!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew thinks it's the greatest thing ever. I have the 700 stealths so I haven't tried these myself. They're turtles beaches though so I imagine they'll do the job pretty well. If anything comes up to prove me wrong I'll change my review to reflect those changes.
customer_reviews.author: SlappyWag

customer_reviews.title: Good with one minor issue.
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I use them on my xb1 and ps4 and they're great. They even work on my cell. They are loud and people can hear me. I love the flip mic mute and volume controls on the side. I only gave it 4 starts though because sometimes the sounds cuts out. Even with that, this is still a solid pair of headphones. All in all it was a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Teyanna

customer_reviews.title: They help with not hearing mom nag
customer_reviews.text: My son was so happy when these arrived. He has had many pairs and with in 6 months they no longer work. If that happens I will edit my review. With these ones he cant hear me shouting for him and he says you can hear everything on his games.
customer_reviews.author: Lrflanders

customer_reviews.title: It’s not wireless but you do have to charge the headset due to it  amplified settings
customer_reviews.text: I love the headset it sets comfortably over my ears and the sound is great specially when you have the amplification turned on but I was not aware of having to charge the headset because its not wireless. I assume that it has that information in the “ details “ but I figured because it was wired that it didn’t need to charge but on the plus side it comes with the charger!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Oglesby

customer_reviews.title: Easy 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these things. Just played 12 straight hours and NO problems. They not only put out awesome sound, the flip mike is awesome. You can hear yourself scratching your leg with the mike. Primarily play PS4 and COD4 and you can’t go wrong!!!
customer_reviews.author: jP

customer_reviews.title: Buy something thatll last
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying them each time I had an issue first set the mic went out within 3 weeks the second pair the mic no longer allowed outside noise to come in so I end up talking too loud or lifting one side so I done make too much noise oh the second had issues two weeks in together they both probably have 8hrs
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this product. Over one year is use. Battery lasts a long time and charges quickly. Comfortable, light weight. Great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Needs to be charged separately.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality but the have to be charged instead of them just working off the controller battery. That is the major down side with them especially when playing competitively.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Mahoney

product_meta.title: Turtle Beach Recon 200 White Amplified Gaming Headset for Xbox One, PS4 and PS4 Pro
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteLouder is better! Immerse yourself in your games with the Recon 200’s powerful amplified audio with Bass Boost. Whether you play on Xbox One or PS4, the Turtle Beach Recon 200 gaming headset delivers high quality game sound and crystal clear chat through its superior 40mm speakers and high sensitivity flip to mute mic. Additionally, the Recon 200’s lightweight design, metal reinforced headband, and synthetic leather wrapped memory foam cushions provide added durability and unmatched comfort. The Recon 200 has a rechargeable battery that delivers over 12 hours of gaming per use, and features onboard controls for Master Volume, Variable Mic Monitoring so you can hear and adjust the volume of your voice inside the headset to avoid shouting at other players, and for selecting between Xbox One and PS4.
feature_bullets: Powerful amplified audio: Immerse yourself in your games with rechargeable battery powered amplified sound from your Xbox One and PS4
Surround sound ready for Xbox One: Optimized to deliver immersive Windows Sonic Surround sound, provided by Microsoft for Xbox One (and compatible Windows 10 PCs)
Speaker frequency response: 20 hertz 20 kilohertz; Flip up Mic Turtle Beach's renowned high sensitivity mic picks up your voice loud and clear, and flips up to mute
Variable mic monitoring: Hear and adjust the volume of your voice inside the headset so you never have to shout
Multiplatform compatibility: Designed for Xbox One and PS4, and also works great with Nintendo Switch, PC, and mobile devices

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars4,172 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
